terrains.name: Places of Power
terrains.description: After territories are determined, before faction terrain features are set up, you can pick up to 3 terrain features on the battlefield that are wholly outside enemy territory. Those terrain features are considered by you to be overgrown terrain features.

grandStrategies.name: Chorus of the Woodlands
grandStrategies.description: When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if you completed at least 4 battle tactics and every battle tactic you completed was from the 'Songs of War' list.

grandStrategies.name: Vengeance and Spite
grandStrategies.description: When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if the model picked to be your opponent's general was slain by an attack made by a friendly OUTCASTS unit.

grandStrategies.name: The Roots of Victory
grandStrategies.description: When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there is a friendly Awakened Wyldwood in each quarter of the battlefield and all enemy units are more than 6" from all friendly Awakened Wyldwoods on the battlefield.

start.name: Abundant Growth
start.description: At the start of your hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to each friendly EVERGREEN HUNT unit that is wholly within 9" of an overgrown terrain feature.

battleTactics.name: Eradicate Trespassers
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 enemy unit within 6" of a friendly Awakened Wyldwood. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn.

battleTactics.name: Harness the Spirit Paths
battleTactics.description: You complete this battle tactic if any models in a friendly SYLVANETH unit that was set up using the From the Woodland Depths battle trait this turn make a charge move this turn.

battleTactics.name: Balance the Cycle
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of an overgrown terrain feature or friendly Awakened Wyldwood. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed by an attack made by a friendly SYLVANETH unit that was added to your army this turn.

battleTactics.name: March of the Forest Lords
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 enemy MONSTER on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that MONSTER is slain by an attack made by a friendly SPIRIT OF DURTHU, TREELORD ANCIENT or TREELORD during this turn.

battleTactics.name: Unleash Ghyran's Wrath
battleTactics.description: Pick 1 friendly SYLVANETH WIZARD on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if a spell successfully cast by that WIZARD, or an endless spell summoned by that WIZARD, destroys an enemy unit this turn.
